externalTradeFair.c_lan_part_2: The title fair will be held. The discussion fair is divided into
externalTradeFair.c_lan_part_3: 02. Subsidy will be provided at the rate specified in the following metrics, considering the export revenue of ur organization on booth price in case of participation in the fair:
externalTradeFair.c_lan_part_4: 03. Applications are invited from reputed exporters interested in participating in the proposed fair. Interested participants should send the application form filled in the prescribed form of the Bureau along with the pay order in favor of the Export Development Bureau.
externalTradeFair.c_lan_part_5: A request was made to submit the submission to the Fairs and Exhibitions Department of the Bureau by the date. The documents mentioned in the application form should be submitted along with the submission. Note that the application form can be downloaded from the table.
externalTradeFair.c_lan_part_6: 04. The participation fee is non-refundable if an organization does not participate in the fair for any reason after being selected. However, if an applicant organization is not selected, the pay order submitted for their participation fee will be refunded.
